comments: This constant is the average value of A051903. - _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Oct 30 2012
references: I. Niven, Averages of Exponents in Factoring Integers, Proc. Amer. Math. Soc. 22, 356-360, 1969
links: Simon Plouffe, The Niven constant to 256 digits
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Niven's Constant
mathematica: rd[n_] := rd[n] = RealDigits[ N[1 + Sum[1 - 1/Zeta[j], {j, 2, 2^n}] , 105]][[1]]; rd[n = 4]; While[rd[n] =!= rd[n-1], n++]; rd[n] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Oct 25 2012 *)
author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
extensions: Offset corrected by Oleg Marichev (oleg(AT)wolfram.com), Jan 28 2008
